Name: Trouble Town
About the game: Play with online players. Join one of the teams and help him to win. Choose your skin, then enter the game. Pick up your weapons and ammunition and then complete your goal defined by the role you play. Cooperate with other players. Recomended 4 players or more. Win by killing all traitors or wait out the game time Watch out for other players, choose your friends carefully React to any suspicious activity of other players, keep an eye on everyone Identify the corpse to find out who is the body and other information about the death Work with the Detective to find Traitors Kill all Traitors or wait the game time to win You have access to the Detective's point shop Your task is to find all the Traitors [*Use the help of Innocents and systems located on the map to win Special items from the shop will help you find Traitors Kill all other players to win You have access to the Traitor Point Store for special items Watch out for Detectives who are trying to find you Cooperate with other Traitors to kill all other players, create intrigues Kill in the shadows, blend in with Innocent players You can use teleporters to quickly move around the map You win when you are killed by other players Provoke others to kill you You dom't hurt other players by shooting, be careful that others may recognize your role Game created by one person.
